awd_titl_txt: RESEARCH INITIATION AWARD: New Approaches to Simulation and Control of Power Electronic Systems
awd_abstract_narration: The importance of power electronic                                              equipment has stimulated research in                                            computer-aided design tools.                                                    General purpose simulators developed                                            for non-switched analog (and mixed                                              mode) networks are not suitable.                                                Events of interest in a typical                                                 power converter cover many orders of                                            time scale magnitude, from                                                      nanoseconds to seconds.  The work                                               proposed here uses a new switch                                                 model and an innovative cycle                                                   averaging scheme to speed up the                                                numerical integration.  A desktop PC                                            implementation of the simulation                                                algorithm is proposed.
org_div_long_name: Division of Electrical, Communications and Cyber Systems

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF COLORADO
